videos.description: Benny the Bull starts with some popcorn antics but shows his versatility with a wide array of dance moves.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Benny the Bull wastes popcorn, but redeems himself with these dance moves) 2021/05/13 ESHEET
